manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Integration of the Visual GC tool into NetBeans IDE. Adds Window | Visual GC menu item to easily launch Visual GC integrated into the IDE.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.openide.awt > 6.7.1, org.openide.dialogs > 6.5.1, org.openide.modules > 6.5.1, org.openide.options > 6.4.1, org.openide.util > 6.8.1, org.openide.windows > 6.5.1
